name: Monk's Brew
description:
Monk's Brew is a competitive local multiplayer game (2v2) where you and your teammate challenge your opponents to create the most divine brew by playing challenging, cooperative mini games under the harsh conditions of a 13th century monastery.

The game is strictly cooperative (4-players), no solo playing or lone wolfing - you will not make it! Support only for xbox controllers.

Brew fast and praise the lord!
